channel.title: Version 5.27 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.27.0 (2024-04-07) Enhancements [feature] theme: simplify title generat'n #825 [feature] theme: adjust t' Hugoâ€™s build-in code #824 [feature][change] link: warn if fragment be not found #823 [feature] theme: add styl'n fer selected HTML elements #822 [feature] a11y: improve search box #821 [feature][change] dependencies: make loader more versatile #820 [feature] nav: scroll t' prev/next head'n us'n keyboard shortcut #819 [feature] breadcrumb: use .LinkTitle instead o' .Title if avail'ble #816 Fixes [bug] scrollbar: scroll bar 'n side menu gets stuck 'n dragged state on mobile #808
